title: Cocteleio
description: A coctail finder application. Search your cocktail either by name or by ingredient. I made this project to practice AJAX requests on APIs, as well as the MVC model.

title: React Calculator
description: Simple Calculator. You can make all basic operations. My first React-Redux practice project. In the future more stuff will be added such as: more complicated operations and actions. Also it will become more interactive with the user.

title: Noter App
description: A simple Note app. A React based application I made to practice CRUD. It uses a fake JSON server to fetch all notes. You can Create a note, Read a note , Update a note and Delete it. In the future more functions will be added as well as more styling.
